14 Jun

Umunsi mwiza w’umwana w’umunyafurika!
#DAC2025

National Child Development Agency | Rwanda @Rwanda_Child

Muri @RusiziDistrict hateraniye abana, ababyeyi n’abayobozi mu nzego zitandukanye, bari kwizihiza Umunsi w’Umwana w’Umunyafurika ku nsanganyamatsiko, “Ndera Neza, Nkure Nemye.”
Kwizihiza uyu munsi byahariwe kwigisha uburere buboneye hagamijwe kurinda abana ihohoterwa.
#DAC2025

#ImbutoEngages

ArtRwanda - Ubuhanzi @ubuhanziRw

Yesterday, we hosted a roundtable with @RwandaYouthArts & leading creatives to discuss #ArtRwandaUbuhanzi, focusing on turning talent into profit & boosting the creative industry’s global impact.
